s: Thomas Youngblood and drummer Richard Warner founded Kamelot in Tampa, Florida back in 1992. In 1994 the band signed a deal with Noise Records, and the release of the debut Eternity followed in August of the next year. The press praised the album as one of most promising debuts of all time.

Kamelot is one of those rare bands that can transcend several styles of music at once. From epic and orchestral metal to progressive and almost theatrical pieces, this album hits all the right notes with catchy riffs, blazing instrumentals and soaring vocals.
